channel.title: Pages on Lapjo
channel.description: Recent content in Pages on Lapjo

item.title: About
item.description: A writer on different topics I’m a son of two and employer of one. I like explore the open source space and test the different interesting applications one could use. A lot of them extremely useful & practical and others simply fun and interesting. I’m also a hobbyist moonshiner with 4 years of random blends and experiments, a Coen Brothers fanatic, and a football (soccer) lunatic.
